content.question: The commercial rivalries discussed in the third paragraph best illustrate the interplay between nineteenth-century economic development in Japan and the development of

choices.label: extractive economies as part of Western imperialism
a global consumer economy leading to increased living standards worldwide
new regional and international identities opposed to nationalism

topic.text: 5.7: Economic Developments and Innovations in the Industrial Age

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
